children.subject:
Please note - TODAY is last day for students to drop a class without paying a late drop fee. (You can learn more on the Registrar's website)

And for students in CS 162 - as Mayra said above, this is an EARLY DROP DEADLINE class - today is the last day you can drop the class.

history.content:
Early Drop Deadline

Friday, 1/31/20 at 11:59 PM.

CS 162 is an early drop deadline course. See list of classes here.

Deadline to Add/Drop without Late fees

Class Drop Deadline without a late fee is 1/31/20 at 11:59 PM

Class Add Deadline without a late fee is 2/7/20 at 11:59 PM

Swap Deadlines

Undergraduate Deadline to Add/Drop/Swap/Change Units is 2/12/20 at 11:59PM.

Graduate Deadline to Add/Drop/Swap is 2/21/20 at 11:59PM.

Swap actions are adds and drops. Late add/drop fees will apply to swaps.

See detailed enrollment calendar here.
